channel.title: Tortilla on tracker
channel.description: Recent content in Tortilla on tracker

item.title: recipe: tortilla casserole
item.description:
This comes out kind of like a lasagna and is designed the same way: lots of layers.

Ingredients:

  • one package tortillas (whole wheat, corn, or flour)
  • one can tomatoes with chiles
  • one can black beans
  • 1/2 jar corn relish
  • one package shredded cheese

assemble in layers, roughly as so:

  • tortillas
  • tomatoes with chiles
  • tortillas
  • beans
  • cheese
  • tortillas
  • relish
  • cheese

Bake in a 350 degree oven; I left it in for about an hour, until the top was nicely browned and not singed.

Served 3 (one dinner guest opted out)
